title: srsly????? help me plz

embed.description: See posts, photos and more on Facebook.

body:
I was playing rank game. suddenly, my client stop and this picture came up. is it client bugs??
help me plz. right now, I got leaverbust, and also I can't even play games now.

replies.body: I can't see that picture, but I'm assuming it was either deleted because the issue fixed itself or you might be having that strange [**login issue**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password). If you are having that login issue, try changing your region to something different and then switching it back. After changing it back, you should get a patch and then be able to sign back in.
I have been having this exact issue for almost a solid week now, and have now multiple "left" games when I wasn't even able to get in the game to begin with.
